name: Regal Air - Crown Aviation, LLC
about: Regal Air - Crown Aviation, LLC is a comprehensive flight training institution based in Everett, Washington. Established to provide top-notch aviation education, Regal Air offers a range of programs including Private Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Multi-Engine Airplane Addon. The school also provides flight instructor training and various endorsements such as High-Performance and Technically Advanced Airplane Checkouts. Approved by the VA, Regal Air allows veterans to use their education benefits towards flight training. Additionally, the school offers aircraft rentals, air charter services, aircraft maintenance, and pilot supplies. Regal Air is committed to delivering high-quality instruction and supporting both U.S. and international students in achieving their aviation goals.
